Title: Sensitive Data Exposure in loopback
Description:
Versions of `loopback` (3.x) (2.x) are vulnerable to Sensitive Data Exposure. Invalid API requests to the login endpoint may return information about the first user in the database. This can be used alongside other attacks for credential theft. If you're using `loopback` upgrade to or later.
If you're using `loopback` upgrade to or later.
AffectedVersions: All versions up to 2.41.0, all versions starting from 3.0.0 up to 3.25.0
NotImpacted: All versions after 2.41.0 before 3.0.0, all versions after 3.25.0
